title: Use ContentPresenter in MasterDetailsView instead of ListView
body: Currently, In MasterView, we can only use ListView. It limits the use case of MasterView. We can't use Pivot, Semantic Zoom, GridView, PullToRefresh, SlidableListItem and more. But if it accepts ContentPresenter then the limit would be endless.

comments.body: @ShawnKendrot But default style must be generic not specific.
NOTE: It's already possible to change the list portion by restyling the control. This is a standard part of XAML controls
